actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to increase the levels of price support loans provided under the producer storage program for the 1979, 1980, and 1981 crops of wheat and feed grains, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Act of 1949 to increase the level of price support loans for the producer storage program for the 1979, 1980, and 1981 crops of wheat and feed grains.

titles.title: A bill to increase the levels of price support loans provided under the producer storage program for the 1979, 1980, and 1981 crops of wheat and feed grains, and for other purposes.
